{ grapher }

Get Started CRAN Dependency Graph

Interactive graphs in R, an integration of the many amazing works of Andrei Kashcha.

{grapher} lets one visualise large three or two dimensional graphs in RStudio, R markdown, and Shiny. It supports most graph formats (e.g.: igraph, and gexf). Below is a visualisation of the dependencies between R packages available on CRAN.



You can get it with the remotes or devtools package.

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("JohnCoene/grapher")
